articles.author: Parija Kavilanz, CNN Business
articles.title: Sephora is opening up mini shops inside Kohl's stores - CNN
articles.description: Sephora is set to open mini shops inside Kohl's stores, with the first 200 locations debuting in fall of 2021. It's part of an effort to reach more customers outside the mall.

articles.author: Stacy Liberatore
articles.title: CBD does NOT impair driving - but cannabis products with THC can affect abilities for up to 4 hours - Daily Mail
articles.description: The first study into the effects of cannabidiol (CBD) while driving reveals it does not impair a person's abilities behind the wheel, but products mixed with both THC and CBD hinders driving.
articles.content:
Cannabis that contains mainly cannabidiol (CBD) has been found, for the first time, not to impair driving, according to a landmark study.
